card_text: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, you must pay 500 LP (this is not optional), or this card is destroyed. When resolving an opponent's card effect that targets this card, roll a six-sided die and negate that effect if you roll a 3, and if you do, destroy that card. When "Terrorking Archfiend" you control is destroyed and sent to the GY (even during the Damage Step) (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand to the GY, then target that "Terrorking Archfiend" in your GY; Special Summon it.
